concept-wr.title: Deploying and Configuring the SDK Components
concept-wr.shortdesc: Deployment and configuration varies depending on the SDK component. However, some common high-level steps exist.

conbody.p: You must extract the individual SDK tarballs that you wish to use from the overall tarball downloaded from the WindShare site into the appropriate folder.
Please refer to each individual README file for more detailed information.
Depending on the SDK component you want to use, you can:

li.p: Modify configuration files associated with the component.

Create application-specific scripts and place them in the specified directories, so that the SDK component invokes them in response to Titanium Server events in order to trigger the required behavior.
Code API-based interactions with Titanium Server.
